wikipedia_page.main: John Kenneth Major ARIBA, FSA, popularly known as Ken Major (21 October 1928 – 25 July 2009) was an architect, author and world authority on industrial archaeology, particularly windmills, watermills and animal powered machines. As an author, he was known as J Kenneth Major.

response: *Ken Major (1928–2009), architect, author and molinologist, attended Kendal School

link_mentions.page: Society for the Protection of Ancient Buildings
response: The society's Mills Section is the only British national body concerned with the protection, repair and continued use of traditional windmills and watermills; Ken Major carried out much work on its behalf.
*Ken Major (John Kenneth Major, 1928–2009), English architect, author and world authority on industrial archaeology
